en.title: How to Read a Pedigree Certificate: Understanding the Information on Your Cat's Papers
en.content:
A cat's pedigree certificate contains a wealth of information. Knowing how to read it reveals your beloved cat's lineage.

What Is a Pedigree Certificate?

A pedigree certificate is a family tree going back 3-5 generations. It is an official document certifying the cat's purebred status, issued by a registration organization.

How to Read the Information

The certificate includes the cat's registered name, breed, coat color and pattern, sex, date of birth, microchip number, breeder name and cattery name, owner name, sire and dam information (names, registration numbers, coat colors), and grandparent information.

Major Registering Organizations

TICA (The International Cat Association)

The world's largest cat breed registry. Many breeders in Japan are registered with TICA.

CFA (Cat Fanciers' Association)

A historic organization based primarily in the United States.

FIFe (Federation Internationale Feline)

An international organization based primarily in Europe.

Pedigree Management at Fuluck Cattery

Fuluck Cattery breeds TICA-registered Siberians, and we issue pedigree certificates for all kittens.

zh.title: 血统证书阅读指南：详解猫咪血统证书上的信息
zh.content:
猫的血统证书上记载着丰富的信息。了解如何阅读，就能追溯爱猫的血脉根源。

什么是血统证书？

血统证书是记录一只猫3至5代以内家谱的文件。它是由注册机构颁发的、证明猫咪纯种身份的官方文件。

如何解读证书信息

证书上记载有：猫的注册名、品种名、毛色及花纹、性别、出生日期、芯片号码、繁育者名及猫舍名、猫主人名、父猫与母猫的信息（名字、注册号、毛色），以及祖父母的信息等。

主要注册机构

TICA（国际猫协会）

世界最大的猫品种注册机构。日本有很多繁育者在TICA注册。

CFA（爱猫者协会）

以美国为中心的历史悠久的机构。

FIFe（国际猫科动物联合会）

以欧洲为中心的国际机构。

福楽猫舍的血统管理

福楽猫舍繁育TICA注册的西伯利亚猫，所有幼猫均附带血统证书。
